value:
$WmMPID_つばさ,ch12_01_Tsubasa_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I'm Tsubasa Oribe, and I'm an idol!
I, uhh...I'm here to do my bery VEST!
Aw, dang, I totally messed that up...$k$p

$WmMPID_エレオノーラ,ch12_02_Eleonora_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I'm Eleonora Yumizuru, and I'm an
actress. Behold my silver-screen
bow skills!$k$p

$WmMPID_まもり,ch12_03_Mamori_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I'm Mamori Minamoto! I won't forgive
anyone who hurts my friends!$k$p

$WmMPID_霧亜,ch12_04_Kiria_F_Normal,Face|$w0|My name is Kiria Kurono. I'm an artist.
This voice of mine is enough to make
anyone shiver, so prepare yourself.$k$p

$WmMPID_樹,ch12_00_Itsuki_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I am Itsuki Aoi, with the Fortuna
Entertainment talent agency. I am
Chrom's Mirage Master, and proud!$k$p
